message:
I’m a web developer turned inspiring iOS developer looking to round out my portfolio. Let me build your startup a table view iOS application that connects to your API.  I already have 2 apps in the App Store and 2 more that are waiting to be reviewed. I’ll work on this in my free time so It might take a few weeks/months. I’ll deliver a clean code base and Git repository. The only thing I would like in return is attribution and a letter of recommendation.
 
If you’re interested contact me at hniphoneoffer@gmail.com
you might want to tell what apps you have in the app store
We're looking for a iOS developer at BakedCode (http://bakedcode.com/jobs). Feel free to drop us an email if you're interested in building Interstate (http://interstateapp.com) for iOS.

@equinox okay. I've built a drawing app, a couple of camera apps and a game. I'm looking to build a table view app(http://developer.apple.com/library/ios/#documentation/userexperience/conceptual/TableView_iPhone/AboutTableViewsiPhone/AboutTableViewsiPhone.html) that connects to a startups web services api. Preferably public and in JSON format but we can workout the details.

@iphonedev why don't you just build a better convore iphone app, adding more fancy features (youtube, offline reading, caching, sharing, direct photo upload, etc)... if you're just doing this for portfolio and not money
+1 for the convore app. convore on any smartphone sucks
Nevermind .. I take that back. convore webapp on any smartphone .. sucks
The Convore iPhone app is even worse. You can build a better one ;)
I don't actually think this will work. Use a startup's public API to build the most awesome app anyone's ever seen, and get _paid_ tons of cash to do the same for everyone else.

@iphonedev - we need help building an iphone app for www.ShowMeTheLove.co.  The mobile app is simple:  it allows a user to post an expression of love via their mobile (e.g., "I took [wife's name] to the park for a picnic."), which notifies their partner via mobile & email, and allows the partner to rate how meaningful that expression was to them via mobile.  We have mockups of the mobile app, but we welcome your creativity.  Email me at info@ShowMeTheLove.co if you're interested.

We are doing some groundbreaking stuff at CrowdMob.  Not only what you see on our website, but much, much more.  Skim our job req: http://www.crowdmob.com/careers/engineering and if you're interested reach out to me by messaging me on facebook!  http://www.facebook.com/matthewpaulmoore
Thanks for all the responses. I think I found a project to work on.
